required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: IL-6 and IL-8 Level of Blood and Pleural Effusion During Chemotherapy in Metastatic Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Study Assessing the Correlation Between Disease Prognosis and the Level of IL-6 and IL-8 Level in Blood and Pleural Effusion Before and After Chemotherapy in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Change of IL-6 and IL-8 level in blood and pleural effusion before and after chemotherapy correlate with the prognosis of the disease

detailed_description.textblock: To assess the correlation between the disease prognosis and the level of IL-6 and IL-8 in blood and pleural effusion before and after chemotherapy in patients with metastatic breast cancer

clinical_study.why_stopped: it's too slow to enroll suitable patients into this study

study_pop.textblock: metastatic breast cancer patients with pleural effusion
